basics.name: Jhon Fredy Romero
basics.headline: Senior Front-End Engineer | Software Engineer | Veeva Expert

summary.name: Summary
summary.content:
Senior Front-End and Software Engineer with 7+ years of experience delivering scalable, compliant, and high-impact digital solutions within regulated environments, particularly in the pharmaceutical industry. Specialized in designing and architecting modern web applications, with deep expertise in front-end engineering using React, Angular, Astro, Sass, and Node.js.

Recognized as a technical leader and platform owner, I have designed internal platforms, boilerplates, and automation tools, while also owning CI/CD pipelines and cloud deployments on Azure. I have led distributed teams across multiple regions, defined end-to-end development workflows, and proactively resolved complex compliance issues.

I focus on building maintainable systems, enabling teams through strong engineering practices, and continuously improving delivery through automation, scalable architecture, and high-quality technical execution.

items.summary:
• Served as Front-End Lead and Veeva Expert, owning development standards, technical decision-making, and compliance resolution across the account and standardizing end-to-end Digital Sales Presentations (DSPs) development workflows, significantly reducing delivery time and manual effort.

  • Designed, deployed, and supported React + Node.js internal platforms to automate project delivery, business rules enforcement, compliance validation, and Jira task generation.

  • Designed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Azure Pipelines, enabling automated deployments of multiple internal React + Node.js applications to Azure Web App Services.

  • Led and mentored distributed teams across India, Czech Republic, Costa Rica, Colombia, and Poland, providing technical leadership and knowledge sharing.

• Developed Digital Sales Presentations (DSPs) on the Veeva platform, delivering interactive, gesture-based experiences for healthcare professionals.

  • Designed and implemented a custom Astro + React boilerplate, enabling scalable slide-based SPAs, automated builds, and full compliance with Veeva requirements.

  • Led technical processes and team organization, defining workflows, task breakdowns, delegation strategies, and providing technical guidance to front-end developers.

• Styled and customized AEM components to match pharmaceutical web designs under strict platform and CSS constraints.

  • Designed and implemented a scalable Sass-based CSS architecture, modularizing styles into a single deployable AEM-compatible output.

  • Introduced Git-based version control and local live-preview workflows, significantly improving maintainability and team efficiency.

• Converted UI/UX designs into reusable components using Angular and Vue.js.

  • Developed pixel-perfect, mobile-first layouts for mobile and desktop following best design practices.

  • Implemented features by consuming backend APIs, with full focus on front-end development.

• Developed and maintained reactive backend services using Java Spring Boot.

  • Designed and exposed REST APIs, integrating them with an Angular front-end.

  • Built Angular components and integrated them with backend services.

  • Worked with PostgreSQL, handling complex data models and large datasets.

• Owned the technical architecture and overall system design, leading both frontend and backend development.

  • Translated business and user requirements into technical solutions and development estimates.

  • Led release management, including code reviews, client demos, QA handoffs, and technical decision-making.

items.name: Spotify Clone
items.summary: Built a Spotify clone with Astro and React, leveraging Island Architecture. By integrating the View Transitions API and Zustand, I enabled seamless, uninterrupted audio playback during SSR navigation, blending the SEO benefits of a multi-page site with the fluid UX of an SPA.

items.name: Spotify Clone
items.summary: Built a Spotify clone using Astro and Vue 3 that defies the traditional MPA/SPA boundary. By utilizing View Transitions and Pinia, I created a multi-page site where music never stops during navigation, combining the SEO benefits of SSR with the fluid UX of a modern SPA

items.name: Prodigious - Publicis Global Delivery
